FuncDef: This command is used to apply HQoS Adjustment to a Vport. HQoS Adjustment refers to the dynamic adjustment of the rate limit at an QoS enforcement point within router when the multicast traffic stream is disjointed from the unicast traffic stream. This QoS enforcement point within router represents the physical point further down in the access part of the network where the two streams join each other and potentially can cause congestion.
